    class Api::AuthController

    Public Instance Methods

    login() click to toggle source 
    # File app/controllers/api/auth_controller.rb, line 6
def login
  resource = User.find_for_database_authentication(:email=>params[:username])
  return invalid_login_attempt unless resource
  if resource.valid_password?(params[:password])
    render :json=> {:valid=>true, :email=>resource.email}
    return
  end
  invalid_login_attempt
end

    Protected Instance Methods

    ensure_params_exist() click to toggle source 
    # File app/controllers/api/auth_controller.rb, line 17
def ensure_params_exist
  return unless params[:username].blank?
  render :json=>{:success=>false, :message=>"missing username parameter"}, :status=>422
end
    invalid_login_attempt() click to toggle source 
    # File app/controllers/api/auth_controller.rb, line 22
def invalid_login_attempt
  warden.custom_failure!
  render :json=> {:success=>false, :message=>"Error with your login or password"}, :status=>401
end
